Articles.Content:
Hello,

just stumbled over this (actualy gamebreaking) bug:

I was flying low in Kerbin, and just before touchdown (a few meters above ground) I quicksaved (as always!), just to be sure in the case of a.... not so successful landing. And yeah.... the landing was not quite perfect

SO I loaded the quicksave, but as soon as it loaded, the cockpit crashes into Kerbin, killing Jeb and letting the rest of the craft hovering over the ground (time freezes) :/

I try to deliver the save...

http://ul.to/f/gtgw57

Edited November 11, 2015 by stoani96
